name: apda-committee-blog
description: Modern blog site for American Parliamentary Debate Association committees

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.seed: cd backend && npm run db:push && npx tsx src/scripts/seed-committees.ts && npx tsx src/scripts/seed-blog-posts.ts
